body_html: Yes, it looks like it's a documentation issue. According to stackoverflow, the develop mode doesn't install the requirements. You have to install them separately. Closing a looping internally to update the doc.
body_text: Yes, it looks like it's a documentation issue. According to stackoverflow, the develop mode doesn't install the requirements. You have to install them separately. Closing a looping internally to update the doc.
body: Yes, it looks like it's a documentation issue. According to [stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/28509965/setuptools-development-requirements), the `develop` mode doesn't install the requirements. You have to install them separately. Closing a looping internally to update the doc.
